1567410.name: Dreams of Valhalla
1567410.description:
Dreams of Valhalla is an action rogue where you battle through the 9 realms in order to obtain eternally glory in Valhalla.

The player controls a single hero and fights off a hordes of enemies (100s).
The player becomes stronger by defeating enemies and obtaining experience to "level up".
Upon leveling up, the player may choose between a variety of abilities to help them against even more difficult enemies.

Each realm has a unique set of enemies and a unique boss.

The goal is to defeat the boss of each realm and be blessed as Einherjar. Thus obtaining the priviledge to enter Valhalla.
